metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37970 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Use after free in File System API in Google Chrome prior to 94.0.4606.54allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-37970` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 94.0.4606.71-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 94.0.4606.71-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 94.0.4606.71-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 94.0.4606.71-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 94.0.4606.71-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '94.0.4606.71-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
